message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, Alice! 90% for me, 10% for you, that's the deal!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I'll give you 40% and take 60%.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. 70% for me, 30% for you. Take it!
I'm not giving in yet, Bob. I'll give you 45% and take 55%.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect any more generosity from me. 55% for me, 45% for you. Final offer!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Let's split it 50/50 and end this game!
